content.raw:
The fact that it's different depending on whether you `import *` though is baffling.

Lyse is doing some magic with the global namespace of the analysis scripts in order to print its deprecation warning - but it returns the same value for `path` either way so I'm not seeing how that could make a difference.
content.html:
The fact that it's different depending on whether you import * though is baffling.

Lyse is doing some magic with the global namespace of the analysis scripts in order to print its deprecation warning - but it returns the same value for path either way so I'm not seeing how that could make a difference.
